layout - Variable in class jtxt.emulator.tui.Container
The layout that determines how the children of this container will be placed within it.
Layout - Interface in jtxt.emulator.tui
Allocates the bounds of a Container's children, using objects passed to these children to determine the location in which they will be placed.
